hadiths.text: It was narrated that Al-Muttalib bin Wadaah said:"I saw the Prophet when he had completed his seven (circuits of Tawaf); he came to the edge of the Mataf and prayed two Rakahs, with nothing in between him and people who were circumambulating." (Daif)

chapter.eng-name: Where Should One Pray The Two Rakahs Of Tawaf?
